entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Kelowna
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 2:28 p.m. PDT Saturday 6 May 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 13.7Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kelowna Airport 8:00 PM PDT Saturday 6 May 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: 13.7°C
Pressure: 101.1 kPa
Visibility: 16 km
Humidity: 64 %

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers this evening. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low 7. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Saturday 6 May 2023
